_sText:
This map is more likely to have the status of a single player than a multiplayer, since the map does not provide for either rescue of the hostages or the installation of explosives.

It is only possible to walk around the temple rooms and play classic casino games.



The map includes four full games:


 - tic-tac-toe;

 - Pinko Club;

 - Jackpot;

 - Blackjet;



The essence of creating such a map is to show that the impossible can be made possible.

In my practice of porting maps, there were many different maps where mappers tried to come up with something unusual with the help of crutches.

Why crutches, but because the CSS engine is essentially simply not adapted to create something like this.
Everything had to be done literally from Shit and Sticks.

For me, this work was just a variation of the development of my abilities in algorithmization.

I can also safely say that no one has created anything like this before me.
